page.title: 15Where can we go to?
page.content: Whitchurch is quite an easy place to get to by public transport.At the moment you can travel by bus to Basingstke,Andover,Salisbury and Winchester.There is also a coach service which runs from Southampton to Oxford,so you can travel to all the places along that route.The most frequent bus service runs fro Basingstoke to Andover and this runs approximately every hour. There used to betwo railway stations in Whitchurch,one on the old line from Southampton to Didcot,this is now closed and the other is on the existing line from London to Exeter.The trains run quite frequently,you can catch a train about every two hours in either direction. The only problem is that the station is an uphill walk out of the town.
